sentences.en: Chronic constipation, chronic diarrhea, pregnancy, and portal hypertension enhance hemorrhoid formation.
sentences.cn: 慢性便秘 、 慢性腹泻 、 怀孕和门静脉高压均能刺激痔形成.

sentences.en: Conclusion Aescuven forte is a convenient, valid and reliable method to treat acute incarcerated hemorrhoid.
sentences.cn: 结论喜疗妥+迈之灵合用是治疗急性嵌顿痔简便 、 有效、可靠的治疗方法,为临床医生下步治疗创造条件.

sentences.en: Hemorrhoid ( or pile ) : Mass formed by distension of the network of veins supplying the anal canal.
sentences.cn: 痔: 肛管黏膜下或齿状线以下的皮下静脉网扩张形成团块.

sentences.en: Lap hemorrhoid Si end , only pure color line.
Methods 32 hemorrhoid were treated by copper cation electrochemistry therapy, and the therapeutic effects were observed.
sentences.cn: 方法应用铜离子电化学治疗仪治疗各期内痔32例, 观察其治疗效果.

sentences.en: Objective : To improve the curative effect of operative treatment in mixed hemorrhoid.
sentences.cn: 目的: 提高手术治疗混合痔的疗效.

sentences.en: Objective : To investigate the effect of experimental hemorrhoid and safety of Kezhi suppository.
sentences.cn: 目的: 考察克痔栓对实验性痔疮的影响及其安全性.

sentences.en: Objective : To observe the effect of sitz bath with fumigant on patients with mixed hemorrhoid surgery.
sentences.cn: 目的: 观察混合痔患者应用术后薰洗方坐浴的治疗效果.

sentences.en: Objective In order to study on the reasons of postoper katie chronic urine retention of hemorrhoid.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨痔术后发生慢性尿潴留的原因.

sentences.en: Objective introduce three and treatment methods for hemorrhoid postoperation hemorrhage.
sentences.cn: 目的介绍痔术后大出血的三种针对性防治方法.

sentences.en: Objective To evaluate the effect of quantified diet guidance on postoperative bowel movement of hemorrhoid patients.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨饮食量化指导对痔术后患者排便的影响.

sentences.en: Objective To evaluate the quality of clinical papers on oral traditional Chinese materia medica hemorrhoid hemorrhage.
sentences.cn: 目的口服中药治疗痔出血临床研究文献中随机对照试验文献的质量.

sentences.en: Objective To investigate the clinical curative effect of Heparinoid and Aescuven forte to acute incarcerated hemorrhoid.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨喜疗妥+迈之灵对急性嵌顿痔的治疗效果.

sentences.en: Objective To investigate the therapeutic effect of copper cation electrochemistry therapy on internal hemorrhoid.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨铜离子电化学法治疗内痔的可行性.

sentences.en: The sun has practical HuaiZhi prescription for hemorrhoid, Fried melon , balsam pear administering eye's rule, diarrhea.
sentences.cn: 比较实用的药方有晒槐汁治痔, 煎苦瓜治眼, 摘瓜蒂治下痢等等不一而足.

words.tran_cn: 痔疮（等于haemorrhoid）；很难相处的人

trans.tran_cn: <医>痔疮，<俚>很难相处的人，招怨的人
trans.tran_en: Haemorrhoids are painful swellings that can appear in the veins inside the anus
